description: Slightly more conservative liquidity buffer and urgency to reduce overdraft without introducing delay; simple start-of-day collateral posting.

on_true.description: Release urgent / overdue payment regardless of liquidity to avoid deadline or EOD risk.
Release when we have enough effective liquidity with small buffer.

on_false.description: Hold low-urgency payments when liquidity is tight to limit overdraft cost.
For non-urgent payments, require modest liquidity buffer before releasing.

payment_tree.description: Always release overdue or near-deadline payments to maintain 100% settlement.

bank_tree.description: No explicit bank-level budget management for this simple scenario.

on_true.description: Post a fraction of max collateral capacity at day start.

on_false.description: Do not adjust collateral intraday in this simple policy.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Post a modest fraction of collateral at the first tick, otherwise hold.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: Hold existing collateral at end of each tick; rely on start-of-day decision.
